Break Point Hand Limit.name: Break Point Hand Limit
Break Point Hand Limit.effect: Continuous: Double your own Break Point and reduce your own hand limit to 3 cards.

Counter Brace.name: Counter Brace
Counter Brace.effect: Temporary: Increase target Thinker's Break Point by the total Power of a target card.

Continuous Overload.name: Continuous Overload
Continuous Overload.effect: Continuous: Increase the Cost of all opposing Thoughts by 1.

Disengage.name: Disengage
Disengage.effect: Immediate: Disengage a target Thought or Group.

Double Break Point.name: Double Break Point
Double Break Point.effect: Temporary: Double a target Thinker's Break Point.

End-turn Disengage.name: End-turn Disengage
End-turn Disengage.effect: Continuous: Disengage target Thought at the end of a turn. If target is removed, remove this card.

Hand Decoy.name: Hand Decoy
Hand Decoy.effect: Immediate: Choose a card from your hand when a card would be removed and discard it instead.

Misdirection.name: Misdirection
Misdirection.effect: Immediate: Change the target of an engagement to a card you control.

Negate Effect.name: Negate Effect
Negate Effect.effect: Temporary: Negate the effect of a target card in play.

Negate Intellect.name: Negate Intellect
Negate Intellect.effect: Immediate: Negate the effect of an Intellect in play and remove it.

Power-amp IV.name: Power-amp IV
Power-amp IV.effect: Temporary: Increase the Power of all target Thinker's Thoughts by 4.

Power-amp X.name: Power-amp X
Power-amp X.effect: Temporary: Increase the Power of all target Thinker's Thoughts by 10.

Power-down.name: Power-down
Power-down.effect: Temporary: Halve the Power of a target card or Group.

Power-drain.name: Power-drain
Power-drain.effect: Temporary: Reduce the Power of a target card to 0.

Recall.name: Recall
Recall.effect: Immediate: Return one target card in play back to the top of its respective deck.

Focus Recovery.name: Focus Recovery
Focus Recovery.effect: Immediate: Gain 1 Focus Counter. This card can only be played as a response to loosing a Focus Counter.

Memory Loss.name: Memory Loss
Memory Loss.effect: Immediate: Choose three cards from your deck, discard them, and shuffle your deck.

Thought Cannon.name: Thought Cannon
Thought Cannon.effect: Immediate: Choose a Thought or Group you control and remove it from play, engage target Thinker with a power equal to the Total Power of the chosen Thought or Group.

Recollection.name: Recollection
Recollection.effect: Immediate: Play any card from your discard pile.

Thought Tribute.name: Thought Tribute
Thought Tribute.effect: Immediate: Remove a Thought you control and play any card from your discard pile with less cost.

Thought Recollection.name: Thought Recollection
Thought Recollection.effect: Immediate: Choose a Thought from a Thinker's discard pile and play it under that Thinker's control.

Intellect Break.name: Intellect Break
Intellect Break.effect: Immediate: Negate and remove a single target Thinker's Intellect in play; target Thinker may discard the top 3 cards of their deck to negate this card.

Thought Break.name: Thought Break
Thought Break.effect: Immediate: Remove a single target Thinker's Thought in play; target Thinker may discard the top 3 cards of their deck to negate this card.

Engagement Break.name: Engagement Break
Engagement Break.effect: Immediate: Negate the resolution of an engagement; any Thinker may discard the top 3 cards of their deck to negate this card.

Ready Break.name: Ready Break
Ready Break.effect: Immediate: Engage a single target Thinker's Thought or Group in play; target Thinker may discard the top 3 cards of their deck to negate this card.

Reload Consciousness.name: Reload Consciousness
Reload Consciousness.effect: Immediate: Discard the hand of all Thinkers. All Thinkers then draw the same number of cards they discarded from their deck.

Amnesia Blast.name: Amnesia Blast
Amnesia Blast.effect: Immediate: Discard the hand of target Thinker whose discard pile contains 15 or more cards.

Removal Amnesia.name: Removal Amnesia
Removal Amnesia.effect: Temporary: Discard the top card of target Thinker's deck when a card they own is removed from play.

Conflict Mark.name: Conflict Mark
Conflict Mark.effect: Continuous: Mark Thoughts that resolve an engagement.

Intellect Mark.name: Intellect Mark
Intellect Mark.effect: Temporary: Mark Thinkers that play Intellects.

Discard Mark.name: Discard Mark
Discard Mark.effect: Continuous: Mark Thinkers that discard cards from their hands.

Mark.name: Mark
Mark.effect: Immediate: Mark one card in play.

Mark Thought.name: Mark Thought
Mark Thought.effect: Immediate: Mark one Thought or Group in play.

Remove Marked.name: Remove Marked
Remove Marked.effect: Immediate: Remove a marked Thought or Intellect in play.

Negate Marked.name: Negate Marked
Negate Marked.effect: Temporary: Negate the effect of all marked cards.

Power-down Marked.name: Power-down Marked
Power-down Marked.effect: Temporary: Halve the power of all marked Thoughts.

Group Marked.name: Group Marked
Group Marked.effect: Immediate: Group target Thinker's Thoughts that are marked and engage them.

Halve Break.name: Halve Break
Halve Break.effect: Temporary: Lower target Thinker's Break point by half.

Foreboding Intellect Negate.name: Foreboding Intellect Negate
Foreboding Intellect Negate.effect: Immediate: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck to negate and remove an intellect played.

Continuous Misdirection.name: Continuous Misdirection
Continuous Misdirection.effect: Continuous: Change the target of an engagement to a card you control.

Force Thought Group.name: Force Thought Group
Force Thought Group.effect: Temporary: Group all of target Thinker's disengaged Thoughts in play. You may only declare a single engagement this turn.

Continuous Power XL.name: Continuous Power XL
Continuous Power XL.effect: Continuous: Increase the power of the target Thought by 40.

Continuous Power XX.name: Continuous Power XX
Continuous Power XX.effect: Continuous: Increase the power of the target Thought by 20.

Continuous Discard.name: Continuous Discard
Continuous Discard.effect: Continuous: Discard the top card of target Thinker's deck when the target Thought resolves an engagement.

Continuous Direct Power-up.name: Continuous Direct Power-up
Continuous Direct Power-up.effect: Continuous: Double the power of the target Thought when it challenges a thinker directly.

Continuous Disengage.name: Continuous Disengage
Continuous Disengage.effect: Continuous: Disengage the target Thought or Group when a turn ends.

Foreboding Power.name: Foreboding Power
Foreboding Power.effect: Temporary: Discard any number of cards from the top of your deck to increase the power of a target Thought by 10 for each discarded card.

Thought Aggro.name: Thought Aggro
Thought Aggro.effect: Temporary: Choose one of your own Thoughts in play, all engagements must target that Thought.

Tireless Purge.name: Tireless Purge
Tireless Purge.effect: Temporary: Disengage the target card if it resolves an engagement and removes a card.

Low-cost Block.name: Low-cost Block
Low-cost Block.effect: Temporary: Thoughts with a cost of 2 or less may not declare and engagement.
